Race.SummaryText:
PARISHWIDE PROPOSITION
(SALES TAX RENEWAL)

SUMMARY:  RENEWAL OF A 1/4% SALES AND USE TAX FOR 10 YEARS TO BE DEDICATED AND USED FOR CAPITAL IMPROVEMENTS, MAINTENANCE AND OPERATION OF POINTE COUPEE PARISH HEALTH SERVICES DISTRICT NUMBER ONE.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Pointe Coupee, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), under the provisions of Article VI, Section 29 of the Constitution of the State of Louisiana of 1974 and Section 2721.6 of Title 33 of the Louisiana Revised Statutes of 1950, as amended, and other constitutional and statutory authority supplemental thereto, be authorized to continue to levy and collect a tax of one-fourth of one percent (1/4%) (the "Tax") upon the sale at retail, the use, the lease or rental, the consumption and storage for use or consumption of tangible personal property and on the sales of services in the Parish, all as defined by law, for a period of ten (10) years from July 1, 2007, the proceeds of the Tax (after paying reasonable and necessary costs and expenses of collecting and administering the Tax), to be dedicated to and used solely for capital improvements, maintenance and operation of the Pointe Coupee Parish Health Services District Number One?

Race.SpecificTitle: Fire Prot. Dist. No.1 -- 3.51 Mill - BOC - 10 Yr.
Race.SummaryText:
FIRE PROTECTION DISTRICT NO. 1 PROPOSITION
(TAX RENEWAL)

SUMMARY:  10 YEAR, 3.51 MILLS PROPERTY TAX RENEWAL FOR MAINTAINING AND OPERATING FIRE PROTECTION FACILITIES; PURCHASING FIRE TRUCKS AND OTHER FIRE FIGHTING EQUIPMENT AND OBTAINING WATER FOR FIRE PROTECTION PURPOSES; AND ACQUIRING, IMPROVING OR CONSTRUCTING FIRE PROTECTION FACILITIES.
Race.FullText: Shall Fire Protection District No. 1 of the Parish of Pointe Coupee, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a special tax of three and fifty-one hundredths (3.51) mills on all property subject to taxation in the District for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2007 and ending with the year 2016, for the purpose of maintaining and operating the District's fire protection facilities, for purchasing fire trucks and other fire fighting equipment and paying the cost of obtaining water for fire protection purposes, including charges for fire hydrant rentals and service and for the purpose of paying the cost of acquiring, improving, or constructing fire protection facilities of the District, constituting works of public improvement, title to which shall be in the public?
